name: Platformer Game (Jack3G)
description:
A 2d platformer where you dual wield a grappling hook and gun.

This is just a prototype!

There isn't much content in the game at the moment (only two levels), but I think it's fun to swing around. Let me know if you think I should keep working on this.

This game uses Kenney's CC0 Pixel Platformer art: https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer (and also some of my own :) )
